caption.p: 3D response surface plots for effect of oil:S mix ratio (X 1) and emulgent:co-emulgent ratio (X 2) on Z-avg ( A), Transmittance ( B), Zeta-potential ( C), and PDI ( D). Overlay plot ( E) for various oil:S mix and emulgent:co-emulgent ratios, where the area that satisfies the constraints is yellow, while the area that does not meet criteria is grey.
